item.title: KDP
item.description: score:255 Chances: Keurig Dr Pepper has a strong track record of outperforming its peers and delivering shareholder performance. The company’s future looks bright with a new leadership transition plan and a focus on growth across categories, including coffee and caffeinated beverages. The beverage market is valued at $300 billion, providing ample opportunities for growth and disruption in consumer preferences.
